lead_paragraph: Miami President Pat Riley is a big fan of the symbolic 12:01 a.m. phone call to his team's top targets. San Antonio coach Gregg Popovich says he would rather be sleeping at that moment. And more than $1 billion in deals will likely be hammered out in the next couple of days alone.

headline.print_headline: NBA Free Agency Just Hours Away and All Eyes Are on Durant
headline.main: NBA Free Agency Just Hours Away and All Eyes Are on Durant
